app.name: Educa360 Avatar Maker
modal.title: You’re almost there!
modal.subtitle: Choose how you want to save your avatar.
modal.name.label: Avatar name
modal.name.helper: This name appears in My Avatars.
modal.step.download.title: Download the .GLB file
modal.step.download.body: Save it on your device and upload it in Hubs later.
modal.step.send.title: Send it straight to Hubs
modal.step.send.body: It will appear in “My Avatars” for your account.
modal.auth_hint: Sign in to Hubs to enable sending.
confirm.randomize.title: Randomize avatar?
confirm.randomize.body: This will replace your current avatar settings.
confirm.return.title: Return to Hubs?
confirm.return.body: If you leave now, you could lose your current avatar changes.
post_send.title: Avatar sent!
post_send.body: Do you want to close this tab or keep editing?
category.Head: Head
status.auth_required: Sign in to Hubs to enable sending.
status.error: Failed to send avatar to Hubs.
